sanskrit: दृष्ट्वा तु पाण्डवानीकं व्यूढं दुर्योधनस्तदा| आचार्यमुपसङ्गम्य राजा वचनमब्रवीत्
Translation: Having seen the army of the Pandavas drawn up in battle array, King Duryodhana approached his teacher, Drona, and spoke these words.
answer: Duryodhana first approached and spoke to his teacher, Drona, after seeing the Pandavas' army formation.
